name: Four-Mile
description:
Get ready to test your nerves.

Four-mile brings back old-school driving with a vengeance. Dodge cops, taxis, motorcycles, and other vehicles to find your way to the top of the leaderboards.

Features include:

- Custom Graphics
- Cool Track and Sound Effects control
- Tilt Based Steering
- Game Center Integration
- Internally Logged Stats
- Share Features for friends
